entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
